lead_paragraph: The head of the Palestinian Football Association (PFA) wants FIFA to adopt what he called a Crimea-style solution to prevent Israeli league clubs from being based in settlements in the occupied West Bank, he said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Palestinian FA Wants Crimea-Style Solution in Dispute With Israel
headline.main: Palestinian FA Wants Crimea-Style Solution in Dispute With Israel

snippet: The head of the Palestinian Football Association (PFA) wants FIFA to adopt what he called a Crimea-style solution to prevent Israeli league clubs from being based in settlements in the occupied West Bank, he said on Tuesday....
